mapper.sql: jobid, jobname, jobsub, jobtypeid, jarea, jcontent, jrequire, jsalary, j_sort, j_audit, creattime, updatetime, ispass, isdelete, filed1, filed2
mapper.select:
select count(*) from dd_job where
j_audit like #{j_audit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
jobname like #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
jobtypeid = #{jobtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
creattime = #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
isdelete = 1

select dd_job.*,dd_jobtype.jobtypename from dd_job left join dd_jobtype on dd_job.jobtypeid=dd_jobtype.jobtypeid where
dd_job.j_audit like #{j_audit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dd_job.jobname like #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dd_job.jobtypeid = #{jobtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
dd_job.creattime = #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dd_job.isdelete=1 order by dd_job.creattime desc
limit #{num1},#{num2}
mapper.insert: insert into dd_job (jobid, jobname, jobsub, jobtypeid, jarea, jcontent, jrequire, jsalary, j_sort, j_audit, creattime, updatetime, ispass, isdelete, filed1, filed2) values (#{jobid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobsub,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobtypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{jarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jrequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsalary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{j_sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{j_audit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ispass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update dd_job
jobname = #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jobsub = #{jobsub,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jobtypeid = #{jobtypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
jarea = #{jarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jcontent = #{jcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where jobid = #{jobid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
